companies.card_paragraph: Goran Generator Company excels in premium diesel generators, backed by 1000-hour guarantee!
companies.title: Goran Generator Co.
companies.paragraph: Goran Generator Company excels in premium diesel generators, backed by 1000-hour guarantee!

sub_sections.title: Superior Quality Generators
sub_sections.description: Goran Generator Company, located in Erbil, Kurdistan â€“ Iraq, specializes in providing top-notch diesel generators with a 1000-hour work guarantee. Our commitment to excellence ensures reliable electricity solutions tailored for private sectors.

sub_sections.title: Expert Team and Diverse Brands
sub_sections.description: As a crucial division of the Goran Group, our success is owed to a skilled workforce spanning accounting, sales, marketing, and services. We offer a wide array of globally recognized generator brands, including British Perkins, Swedish Volvo, and American Cummins, each certified to instill trust in our clientele.

sub_sections.title: Leading Sales and Service Provider
sub_sections.description: With pride, we've secured the top spot in both sales and service provision in Kurdistan and Iraq. Strong partnerships with governmental bodies, organizations, and petroleum companies have propelled our success.

sub_sections.title: Continuous Commitment to Excellence
sub_sections.description: Driven by an unwavering commitment, we strive to enhance services for citizens and enterprises continually. Our impressive track record underscores our dedication to delivering exemplary services in collaboration with the government.

gallery.title: Driving Progress, Energizing Tomorrow
gallery.paragraph: Propelling innovation and sustainability, our dedication fuels a future defined by advancement.

companies.card_paragraph: Leading healthcare provider with advanced equipment and specialized services.
companies.title: Bahceci Medical Center - Erbil
companies.paragraph: Leading healthcare provider with advanced equipment and specialized services.

sub_sections.title: Central Location and Prestige
sub_sections.description: Bahceci Erbil Medical Center is a key establishment in Erbil, Iraq, centrally situated on 30th Street near the Iranian Consulate.

sub_sections.title: Advanced Medical Equipment
sub_sections.description: Renowned for its cutting-edge medical equipment, Bahceci Erbil Medical Center ensures top-quality healthcare.

sub_sections.title: Comprehensive Healthcare Services
sub_sections.description: Bahceci Erbil Medical Center offers an array of specialized services, including Aesthetics, Orthopedics, and Traumatologies

sub_sections.title: Specialized Sections
sub_sections.description: Bahceci Erbil Medical Center boasts specialized departments focusing on Vertebrae, Brain, Nervous System, Physiotherapy, and Rehabilitation.

gallery.title: Pioneering Healthcare, Shaping Tomorrow
gallery.paragraph: Bahceci Erbil Medical Center pioneers healthcare in Erbil, Iraq, fostering progress and well-being.

companies.card_paragraph: Petroleum limited services for purification and filtering used oil.
companies.title: Jazeerat Al-Naft Co.
companies.paragraph: Oil Company Located In Kirkuk. Petroleum limited services for purification and filtering used oil. It consists of 25 highly experienced employees.

gallery.title: FUELING INNOVATION, SHAPING TOMORROW
gallery.paragraph: At our Kirkuk-based Oil Company, innovation and sustainability drive our commitment to excellence.

companies.card_paragraph: 40+ years supplying high-quality lubricants globally, embodying German excellence.
companies.title: Falkenoil
companies.paragraph: 40+ years supplying high-quality lubricants globally, embodying German excellence.

sub_sections.title: Decades of Dedication
sub_sections.description: Falcon Oil has been developing, producing, and distributing high-quality lubricants and specialties for more than 40 years

sub_sections.title: Global Supply and Quality Assurance
sub_sections.description: We supply our customers globally with OEM certified engine oils, as well as performance-level engine oils, such as lubricants for industrial use. Continuous control of production processes through our partner's laboratories gives us a constant advantage.

sub_sections.title: Optimal Performance Assurance
sub_sections.description: Quality and constant communication with the engineering departments of the original equipment manufacturer ensure optimal performance.

sub_sections.title: Seamless Coordination and Compliance
sub_sections.description: Falkenwell is the link between its customers and premium German manufacturers and will always coordinate the ordering process according to their customers' needs. Constant contact with our distribution partners takes care of compliance with individual orders based on a fair price-performance ratio.

sub_sections.title: Diverse Product Line
sub_sections.description: Falcon Oil products include antifreeze, automobile oils, motorcycle oils, gear oils, hydraulic oils, and multi-grade motor oils.

gallery.title: POWERING PROGRESS, FUELING TOMORROW
gallery.paragraph: Accelerating innovation and sustainability, our commitment runs deep in every drop, propelling a future defined by progress and environmental responsibility.
